alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 06 at 4:17PM EDT until April 08 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS...LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY...AND DRY FUELS EXPECTED OVER THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE FRIDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday morning through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, and 206. * WIND...Becoming west to northwesterly 13 to 17 mph. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 22 to 27 precent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
